wikipedia_page.main: Ross Hussey is a former Ulster Unionist Party (UUP) politician  in Northern Ireland. He was a Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly (MLA) for West Tyrone from 2011 to 2017.

link_mentions.page: List of political families in the United Kingdom
response: *Ross Hussey, UUP MLA. Brother of the above.

In 1998 he was elected as MLA to the Northern Ireland Assembly and re-elected in 2003. He was an outgoing candidate in the 2007 Assembly elections, but lost his seat.  His brother, Ross Hussey, re-took the seat in 2011.
